summary: Custom UUNP Follower with a custom combat style
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#b4a7d6][size=6][b]Erinna[/b][/size][/color]

[i][color=#d9d2e9]~She's Itching For A Fight~[/color][/i]


[img]https://s5.postimg.org/bctyc1u6f/20161001220808_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Erinna
Race:  Nord Based - Custom Race
Voice:  Female Nord (or optional Female Young Eager .esp)
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .96
Weight:  85
Skin:  The Pure (8K/4K)
Body:  Custom UUNP
Location:  Rorikstead - Frost Fruit Inn
Armor:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79020/?]LadyHorus' TERA Armor - Rogue
[/url]*Non Armor Version Now Added*
Weapons:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15122/?]Nicoroshi Creations[/url] (Bow of the Drow w/ Ebony Arrows & Talon of Akatosh)

Class:  Combat Barbarian
Style:  Custom

ENB:  Vividian
Tested with AFT & EFF

Levels with Player.  Nord traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses:  Sneak, Light Armor, Restoration, Archery, Block, One & Two Handed
Perks:  One & Two Handed, Dual Wield, Block, Archery, Light Armor

*Some users may find her overpowered, but she was created that way*

[/font][font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.org/ga2xjf6rr/20161001222628_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  No CBBE?
A:  Not At This Time; Once LadyHorus releases a CBBE version I'll be happy to release CBBE.

Q:  What other armor/weapons was used in screenshots?
A:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68389/?]Draugr Marauder Armor[/url] / [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77934/?]Zoltan Axe[/url]

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Will You Release a Non-Tattoo Version
A:  Soon but the scars will stay.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*


[/font][font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.org/m9qon2rk7/20161001222538_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
HDT Compatible Skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
The Pure is a extremely high quality skin consisting of 4K & 8K textures.
Some lower end systems won't be able to handle without issues.

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/e7z6q0lqf/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/4v36zn7d3/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

This follower is the combination of the work of others as well as mine.  Please seek their permissions in addition to mine.

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/kqvai3kzr/20161001182230_1.jpg[/img]
